title: Mayor releases details for parade honoring Sacramento heroes
content:
Text Size: ASmall Text AMedium Text ALarge Text Photos Spencer Stone, Anthony Sadler, Alek SkarlatosCourtesy photo Sacramento Mayor Kevin Johnson announced Thursday details for a parade that will honor three area heroes for their role in thwarting a terror plot on a European train. The Sacramento Hometown Heroes Parade honoring Anthony Sadler, Alek Skarlatos, and Spencer Stone will be held Sept. 11 at noon on the Capitol Mall.
More coverage: Sacramento hero Spencer Stone set to arrive on American Soil
"Our community has been anxiously awaiting the return of our three hometown heroes -- Anthony, Alek and Spencer -- so that we can celebrate and honor their incredible courage," Johnson said.
Stone is expected to arrive later Thursday.
The mayor's office, governor's office, California Legislature, United States Air Force and the National Guard are working together on parade details.
